pages.text:
Sound it out: rock, thick, run, draw, drip

Know these: the, is, very, into

New words: tower, moat, drawbridge, knight, royal
pages.image_prompt: Three neat rows on a pastel blue background. Each word has a small icon: rock (stone), thick (tree), run (boy running), draw (pencil), drip (water drop), the (crown), is (sparkle), very (thumbs up), into (arrow), tower (spire), moat (water around castle), drawbridge (wooden bridge), knight (armor), royal (king and queen). Clean, fun, easy to read., children's book illustration, bright colors, friendly, engaging, educational, no text in image
